name: Double Beef Burger
description: Two grilled beef patties with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce in a soft bun.

name: Crispy Fried Chicken
description: Golden-brown fried chicken with a seasoned crunchy coating and juicy meat.

name: BBQ Bacon Burger
description: Grilled beef with smoked bacon, BBQ sauce, cheddar cheese, and onion rings.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce topped with spicy pepperoni slices.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Grilled chicken, BBQ sauce, red onions, and mozzarella on a crispy crust.

name: Crispy Chicken Burger
description: Crispy chicken fillet with mayo, lettuce, and pickles in a fresh bun.

name: Spicy Chicken Wings
description: Fried chicken wings tossed in a hot and tangy sauce, served with dip.

name: Chicken Tenders
description: Crispy fried chicken tenders served with honey mustard dipping sauce.

name: French Fries
description: Golden fried potato fries with a pinch of salt.

name: Curly Fries
description: Spiral-cut seasoned fries with a crispy coating.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Breaded mozzarella sticks served with marinara dipping sauce.
